'''City of Winds and Idylls CD Set''' is ''[[Genshin Impact]]'s'' first original soundtrack CD set. It was released on August 4, 2021. The CD set contains the OST album [[City of Winds and Idylls]] of three discs "City of Winds and Idylls", "The Horizon of Dandelion", and "Saga of the West Wind," and additionally, contains the OST album [[The Wind and The Star Traveler]].
